text:
Emilia Clarke and Michael B. Jordan. Frazer Harrison/Rich Polk/Getty Images

Many stars wear some stunning outfits to the MTV TV and Movie Awards.

From colorful suits to sparkling gowns, here are some of the best looks stars have worn to the MTV TV and Movie Awards.

Emilia Clarke, Halle Berry, and Taraji P. Henson have all made the list.

Visit INSIDER's homepage for more stories.

The Oscars are known for the glamour, the Golden Globes for the parties, the MTV TV and Movie Awards for bold and exciting outfits.

In honor of this year's show, we rounded up some of our favorite looks of all time from the event's red carpet.
title: 19 of the best looks from the MTV Movie and TV Awards
